channel.title: Would This Work?

item.title: Would This Work?
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

Would this work for having the right amount of xp before teleporting somewhere?

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mageguild”) && playerXP[6] <= 14900000) {

teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = xxxx;
sendMessage("-Message-");
}
else
{
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = xxxx;
sendMessage("-Message-");
}[/code]

Read full topic
